description:
Plush cushioning to tackle long distances over challenging terrain. The Olympus 5 features an ample toe box that allows your toes to spread and splay naturally during your foot strike, and zero drop that promotes a natural stride. A rounded heel promotes a smoother step from heel to toe.

  • Engineered knit upper is durable and breathable
  • Wide toe box accommodates natural spreading and splaying at the moment of foot strike
  • A-Bound recycled EVA midsole provides maximum cushioning
  • INNERFLEX™ grooves cut weight
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
  • Vibram® MegaGrip outsole with TRAILCLAW™ canted lugs for traction in rugged terrain
name: Altra Olympus 5 Trail Running Shoes - Men's
